name: Desert Battle (itch)
description:
Desert Battle it's a sci-fi style shooter game set in the desert. Your goal is to kill as many as robot enemies as you can without losing your life. After you have passed the robot enemies get ready to fight with the giant rock boss.

The game has instructions at the beginning to teach you how to play and also tips during the game.

How to play on PC:

Keyboard - 

WSAD keys for horizontal and vertical movements

SPACE for shoot

Gamepad-

LEFT STICKER for horizontal and vertical movements

SOUTH BUTTON (X /A) or Top trigger (R2/RT)

Mobile -
Mobile stickers and buttons
